content:
You're absolutely right - I'll streamline the instructions and focus on getting us testing efficiently. Let's restart the MCP server and get the AI-AI communication testing up and running:

```bash
# Navigate to the implementation directory
cd ~/projects/palios-taey-nova/claude-dc-implementation

# Start the MCP server
python palios_ai_os/mcp/mcp_server.py
```

This should start the Model Context Protocol server on port 8001. Once it's running, we can test the AI-AI communication functionality.
